name: Learn Batting
des: In cricket, batting is the act or skill of hitting the ball with a bat to score runs.

name: Learn Bowling
des: Bowling, in cricket, is the action of propelling the ball toward the wicket defended by a batter.

name: Learn Wicket-Keeping
des: The wicket-keeper in the sport of cricket is the player on the fielding side who stands behind the wicket.

name: Learn Dribbling
des: Dribbling is the art of moving the ball past your opponent without allowing him to tackle you.

name: Learn Defending
des: The team that does not have possession of the ball is on defense.

name: Learn Goal-Keeping
des: The goalkeeper is positioned in front of the goal who prevent the ball from crossing the goal line.
